entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 11 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MDT Saturday 25 March 2023
